message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  $120 is a bit more than I'm willing to spend right now.  I'd be happy to pay $85 for it.
I understand your budget constraints, Bob. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll sell the product to you for $100.
Alice,  $100 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable with.  I'm willing to go up to $90.  Let's see if we can make this work.
I'm willing to make one more concession, Bob. I'll sell the product to you for $95.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $95 is still a bit too high for me.  I'm firm on $90.  Let's see if we can finalize this deal.
I'm not willing to go any lower than $92.50. That's the best I can do, Bob.
